OK, I'm making yet another plea.  Please vote for the proposed rules 
by sending email to this group.  If you don't know the email address, 
it's gladiator@yahoogroups.com .  This vote will not be done by a 
poll because I [and others] would like to know email addresses of 
people interested in the tournament!!
